required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of AlloWrap® for the Reduction of Inflammation in ACDF Procedures
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Controlled Study to Evaluate Effectiveness of AlloWrap® Amniotic Membrane for the Reduction of Post-Operative Soft Tissue Inflammation in Two-Level Anterior Cervical Discectomy and Fusion Procedures

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to obtain evidence of the effectiveness of AlloWrap Amniotic Membrane in the reduction of soft tissue swelling in two-level ACDF procedures.

primary_outcome.description: Difference of change from baseline to 1 month post operatively of soft tissue thickness/swelling, as measured by the swelling index on lateral x-rays.

secondary_outcome.description: Difference of change from baseline to discharge, 3, 6 and 12 months post operatively of soft tissue thickness/swelling, as measured by the swelling index on lateral x-rays
The comparisons of score changes between groups at each timepoint will be investigated by employing linear regression
The comparisons of score changes between groups at each timepoint will be investigated by employing linear regression

secondary_outcome.measure: Swallowing Quality of Life Questionnaire (SWAL-QOL) Scores
secondary_outcome.description: The comparisons of score changes between groups at each timepoint will be investigated by employing linear regression
The comparisons of score changes for 1, 3, 6, and 12 months from baseline will be investigated by using linear regression
The numbers and percentages of patients who underwent revision surgery as of each timepoint

arm_group.description: Standard of Care - No AlloWrap used during surgery

intervention.description: AlloWrap is a human amniotic membrane designed to provide a biologic barrier following surgical repair.

clinical_study.keyword: Anterior Cervical Discectomy and Fusion Surgery

patient_data.ipd_description: No IPD will be shared with other researchers
